BICGSTAB.H

Go to the documentation of this file.
00001 //*****************************************************************
00002 // Iterative template routine -- BiCGSTAB
00003 //
00004 // BiCGSTAB solves the unsymmetric linear system Ax = b 
00005 // using the Preconditioned BiConjugate Gradient Stabilized method
00006 //
00007 // BiCGSTAB follows the algorithm described on p. 27 of the 
00008 // SIAM Templates book.
00009 //
00010 // The return value indicates convergence within max_iter (input)
00011 // iterations (0), or no convergence within max_iter iterations (1).
00012 //
00013 // Upon successful return, output arguments have the following values:
00014 //  
00015 //        x  --  approximate solution to Ax = b
00016 // max_iter  --  the number of iterations performed before the
00017 //               tolerance was reached
00018 //      tol  --  the residual after the final iteration
00019 //  
00020 //*****************************************************************
00021 
00022 
00023 template < class Matrix, class Vector, class Preconditioner, class Real >
00024 int 
00025 BiCGSTAB(const Matrix &A, Vector &x, const Vector &b,
00026          Preconditioner &M, int &max_iter, Real &tol)
00027 {
00028   Real resid;
00029   Vector rho_1(1), rho_2(1), alpha(1), beta(1), omega(1);
00030   Vector p, phat, s, shat, t, v;
00031 
00032   Real normb = norm(b);
00033   Vector r = b - A * x;
00034   Vector rtilde = r;
00035 
00036   if (normb == 0.0)
00037     normb = 1;
00038   
00039   if ((resid = norm(r) / normb) <= tol) {
00040     tol = resid;
00041     max_iter = 0;
00042     return 0;
00043   }
00044 
00045   for (int i = 1; i <= max_iter; i++) {
00046     rho_1(0) = dot(rtilde, r);
00047     if (rho_1(0) == 0) {
00048       tol = norm(r) / normb;
00049       return 2;
00050     }
00051     if (i == 1)
00052       p = r;
00053     else {
00054       beta(0) = (rho_1(0)/rho_2(0)) * (alpha(0)/omega(0));
00055       p = r + beta(0) * (p - omega(0) * v);
00056     }
00057     phat = M.solve(p);
00058     v = A * phat;
00059     alpha(0) = rho_1(0) / dot(rtilde, v);
00060     s = r - alpha(0) * v;
00061     if ((resid = norm(s)/normb) < tol) {
00062       x += alpha(0) * phat;
00063       tol = resid;
00064       return 0;
00065     }
00066     shat = M.solve(s);
00067     t = A * shat;
00068     omega = dot(t,s) / dot(t,t);
00069     x += alpha(0) * phat + omega(0) * shat;
00070     r = s - omega(0) * t;
00071 
00072     rho_2(0) = rho_1(0);
00073     if ((resid = norm(r) / normb) < tol) {
00074       tol = resid;
00075       max_iter = i;
00076       return 0;
00077     }
00078     if (omega(0) == 0) {
00079       tol = norm(r) / normb;
00080       return 3;
00081     }
00082   }
00083 
00084   tol = resid;
00085   return 1;
00086 }
